PATIENT_ID: TEST_MSK_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-17 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-17 20:10:00
Category I activation for 28-year-old male. High-speed MVC.
Unstable pelvic fracture on exam. Pelvic ring instability suspected.
BP 82/50, HR 140, RR 30, GCS 14.
Hemodynamically unstable. Hypotension on arrival.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-17 20:30:00
Pelvic x-ray obtained. No CT yet due to instability.
Fracture type not fully characterized on plain film.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-17 20:45:00
Suspected severe orthopedic injury to pelvis.
No compartment assessment documented.
No AVN risk assessment performed.
No vascular examination of extremities documented.
No orthopedic evaluation obtained yet.
Resuscitation ongoing. Pending stabilization for further workup.
